original_title: Ayumi Hamasaki Premium Countdown Live 2008–2009 A
overview: Hamasaki Ayumi's presents a spectacular 3.5 hour concert at the Tokyo's Yoyogi National Gymnasium, capturing the live event's atmosphere. Featured songs include "Real me", "Naturally", "Heartplace", "Days", "independent", and "GREEN", among others.
tagline: Ayumi Hamasaki Premium Countdown Live 2008–2009 A
title: Ayumi Hamasaki Premium Countdown Live 2008–2009 A
